description.narrative: Output 3 [Positive Social Change]: By 2019, communities in priority intervention areas adopt behaviours and practices that promote positive social norms against violence, abuse and exploitation towards children, which contributes to Access To Justice, Birth Registration, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Harmful Practices (Fgm/C And Child Marriage), Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: [Child Protection]: By 2019, children, especially girls, are better protected against violence, abuse and exploitation.
